scripts.release:draft: CHANGELOG=$(sed -n "/^### v$npm_package_version/,/^### /p" ./docs/CHANGELOG.md | sed '1d;$d') && gh release create v$npm_package_version --draft --title v$npm_package_version --notes "$CHANGELOG"
scripts.git:push:all:reversed: CHANGELOG=$(sed -n "/^### v$npm_package_version/,/^### /p" ./docs/CHANGELOG.md | sed '1d;$d' | tac) && git add . && git commit -m "$CHANGELOG" && git push -u origin master
scripts.cicd: yarn git:push:all:reversed && yarn release:draft && yarn release:publish
